data.question: What is the molecular formula of MMK-9?
What method was used to determine the structure of MMK-9?
What is the yield percentage of the synthesis of {(MMK-9)(OCH3)5Ag(AgO2CCF3)}2•4CH2Cl2?
Does the synthesis of MMK-9 involve an oxidative process?
Is dioxygen implicated as the oxidant in the formation of {(MMK-9)(OCH3)5Ag(AgO2CCF3)}2•4CH2Cl2?
What is the role of silver ion in the addition of MeO units to MMK-9?
data.answer: Silver ion may act as a catalyst in the transformation.

data.question: Can C60 react with silver trifluororacetate in methanol to form an addition reaction?
What is the yield percentage of the synthesis of the polymer [{(MMK-9)(OCH3)5Ag(AgOCH3)}2•H2O]n?
Is the polymer [{(MMK-9)(OCH3)5Ag(AgOCH3)}2•H2O]n insoluble in organic solvents?
What is the space group of the crystal structure of MMK-9?
What is the final wR(F2) value in the crystallographic analysis of MMK-9?
Does the crystal structure of {(MMK-9)(OCH3)5Ag(AgO2CCF3)}2•4CH2Cl2 contain dichloromethane molecules?
What is the role of dioxygen in the formation of {(MMK-9)(OCH3)5Ag(AgO2CCF3)}2•4CH2Cl2?
Is the polymer [{(MMK-9)(OCH3)5Ag(AgOCH3)}2•H2O]n formed by layering a solution of MMK-9 with silver nitrate in methanol?
What is the space group of the crystal structure of the polymer [{(MMK-9)(OCH3)5Ag(AgOCH3)}2•H2O]n?
What is the final wR(F2) value in the crystallographic analysis of the polymer [{(MMK-9)(OCH3)5Ag(AgOCH3)}2•H2O]n?
Does the synthesis of MMK-9 result in the formation of two other compounds besides MMK-9?
What is the role of silver trifluoroacetate in the synthesis of {(MMK-9)(OCH3)5Ag(AgO2CCF3)}2•4CH2Cl2?
data.answer: It is used to layer over a solution of MMK-9 to form the dimer.
